description:
Loud and headstrong, Aoi Mirai is a second-year student and the most iconic character of the series. Known among her class by the nickname "Captain", Aoi is a temperamental, fastidious leader, determined to combat the ridicule and undermining she and her group regularly receive from the rest of the school. An accomplice by association, Aoi is required to assist Saku in appropriating their class for the play; a task she grows to respect and admire him for.
Wikipedia
name: Aoi Mirai
